product_name: Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed 600 3-Season Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: Sleep in the wild like you do at home, with a comforter. This 3-season, treated-down sleeping bag has a zipperless comforter and plenty of room to move so you can sleep comfortably in any position.
short_description: Sleep in the wild like you do at home, with a comforter. This 3-season, treated-down sleeping bag has a zipperless comforter and plenty of room to move so you can sleep comfortably in any position.
